title: Preserving Food Without a Fridge
content: Drying: Slice meat or fruit thin and hang in sun or over low fire smoke. Salting: Cover meat or fish with salt, store in dry container. Fat sealing: Mix dried meat with fat (pemmican) and store in cool space. Fermentation: Soak veggies in saltwater for weeks to prevent rot. Clay or ash storage: Bury root vegetables in dry ash, cover with clay for airtight seal.
